name: Slow Bill
description:
Slow Bill is an action game in which you are challenged to clear levels with enemies, by using your gun and your ability to manipulate time. It's fun to play if you have 15 minutes of spare time on your hands. 

This game is based on a game made earlier by the YouTuber Dani, but I tried to make my own thing of it. It's my way too late submission to the 7th Bornwave game jam, which was themed Ancient Technology. 

Enjoy the game, and consider following my account to stay updated about more games being released.

A Game By Selectricity Productions
